title: Key fragment shower
body:
Hi Riot, recently I've gotten 7 key fragments in a row (from winning) and i was wondering if  i am experiencing a bug. I know that they refresh in frequency but every win ive gotten in the past 2 days has resulted in a key fragment. Sorry for creating an unnecessary Discussion if this is just a random really lucky drop sequence. 
Hope you receive this in good health. 
Catspeare

replies.body:
I've noticed this as well, I believe the drops were reset recently.

Then again, I've always had good luck with key drops (4 in the first day of release)
